messages.subject: My 17th century tachi/katana up for auction
messages.msgSnippet: I thought I would post a link to my auction for the 17th century tachi I have on Ebay. Currently, it only has 14 hours before it s over and there seems to be a
messages.messageBody:
I thought I would post a link to my auction for the 17th century tachi
I have on Ebay. Currently, it only has 14 hours before it's over and
there seems to be a lot of interest.
This is the one I believe I asked earlier for help on a translation of
the tsuba. I discovered that it is that of "teruyuki". This sword is a
nice long one (30" nagasa) that had the nakago cut down to katana
length at some point we think between 1780 and 1810.

Have a look!

Mike

http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=200223854905
